places.name: Pinto Art Museum
places.address: 1 Sierra Madre St., Grand Heights Subdivision, Antipolo City
places.description: A contemporary art space showcasing a vast collection of modern Filipino art across several galleries set within a Mediterranean-inspired complex. The museum also features beautiful gardens and panoramic views of the city.

places.name: Hinulugang Taktak
places.address: Taktak Road, Brgy. Dela Paz, Antipolo City
places.description: A historic waterfall and protected landscape, Hinulugang Taktak is a popular spot for picnics and nature appreciation. Recent rehabilitation efforts have improved its facilities, including a swimming pool and meditation areas.

places.name: Antipolo Cathedral (Our Lady of Peace and Good Voyage)
places.description: A significant pilgrimage site housing the 17th-century image of Our Lady of Peace and Good Voyage. The cathedral attracts numerous devotees, especially during the pilgrimage season.

places.name: Cloud 9 Sports and Leisure Club
places.address: Sumulong Highway, Brgy. Sta. Cruz, Antipolo City
places.description: Known for its 360-degree view deck offering stunning vistas of Metro Manila, especially at sunset. The complex includes a restaurant, hanging bridge, and art gallery.

places.name: Luljetta's Hanging Gardens Spa
places.address: Sitio Loreland, Brgy. San Roque, Antipolo City
places.description: A serene spa retreat offering various relaxation amenities, including hydro-massage pools, saunas, and meditation lounges, all set against a backdrop of lush gardens and scenic views.

places.name: PACEM Eco Park
places.address: Assumption Antipolo, Sumulong Highway, Antipolo City
places.description: An ecological park aimed at promoting environmental awareness. It features a mini forest, wildlife sanctuary, aviary, organic garden, and a butterfly museum showcasing species from the Philippines and Asia.

places.name: Mystical Cave
places.address: Puting Bato, Brgy. San Jose, Antipolo City
places.description: A cave known for its stalactites and stalagmites formations resembling religious figures. It has been a filming location for various local television series and movies.

places.name: Casa Santa Museum
places.address: 276 San Jose Ext., Brgy. San Isidro, Antipolo City
places.description: A museum housing an extensive collection of Santa Claus figurines and Christmas-related items from around the world, making it a festive destination year-round.

places.name: Mount Purro Nature Reserve
places.description: An eco-park offering activities such as hiking, bird watching, and river trekking. It emphasizes environmental conservation and community development.
places.cost: Day tour packages start at PHP 650
